subject: GOOD DAY
body:
GOOD DAY
 we have concluded to Send your payment through Money Gram money
transfer $4,000.00 daily until the total fund of ($2.5MILLION ) is
completely transferred. Meanwhile, Mr Hector Giroud has Send you
$4,000.00 in your name today. So contact Mr Hector Giroud, through
Money
Gram money transfer payment Agent to SEND you the MTCN to pick up this
$4000 now:
CONTACT PERSON: Mr Hector Giroud
CONTACT him (
moneygramtransfer763@gmail.com
)
Please remember to Call and ask him to give you the Reference Number,
sender name, question and answer to pick up the $4000.00. 
Also you
should send to him your information to cross check it to avoid
mistake.
Receiver's Name________________
Address: ______________________
Country: ______________________
Phone Number: _________________
Your Occupation _______________
I.D Card
:______________________
Though, Mr Hector Giroud has sent $4000 in your name today so contact
Mr Hector Giroud or you whatsapp him (+229)99751395  as soon as you
receive
this email and tell him to give you the Reference Number, sender name
and question/answer to pick the $4000 Please let us know as soon as
you
received all your fund.
Best Regards.
mrs deborah mgbogi

subject: Re: GOOD DAY
body:
Hello Mrs Deborah Mgbogi,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about this payment through Money Gram. I'm a bit confused though, could you please explain more about the process? How does it work exactly?

Also, you mentioned a Mr Hector Giroud. Who is he and what is his role in this? 

I'm looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Dean

subject: Re: GOOD DAY
body:
sorry I respond to you lately, the issue here is that Hector Giroud is the
in charge of the transfer through MoneyGram transfer, though we wanted to
make the transfer to you on Thursday but the government here said that
there some documents here that accompany your funds that need to be sign by
an attorney before transferring your funds, meanwhile the attorney said you
must pay him the sum of $329 before signing those documents, so I suggest
you get the fee and send across urgently so that we will proceed and
transfer your funds ok

subject: Re: GOOD DAY
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for getting back to me. I appreciate your patience and understanding. It's interesting to hear about Hector Giroud being in charge of the transfer. 

I'm a bit confused about the documents that need to be signed by an attorney. Could you please elaborate more on what these documents are? Also, why is it necessary for an attorney to sign them?

As for the fee, could you provide more details? What exactly is this fee for and how was it calculated?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Dean

subject: Re: GOOD DAY
body:
the documents are the one that show that you are the main owner of the
funds, and according to the law of this country, the attorney must be the
one to sign those documents

subject: Re: GOOD DAY
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's quite interesting to learn about the legal procedures in your country. So, if I understand correctly, the attorney is the one who signs these documents on behalf of the main owner of the funds? 

Could you please explain a bit more about how this process works? For instance, what kind of documents are we talking about here? And why is it necessary for an attorney to sign them instead of the actual owner?

I'm really curious to know more about this. Thanks again for enlightening me!

Best wishes,
Dean
